title: Heat, Refrigerator, Grey Vinyl Tile Flooring, Tennis courts
posting_body: We are currently offering virtual tours.
Please use the link in this ad to visit our website and set up a tour today or give us a call!
Welcome to The Commons at Windsor Gardens
This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 785 Sq.
Ft.
The Commons at Windsor Gardens features outstanding amenities and stylish apartments in Norwood, MA.
Select apartments include hardwood flooring, stainless steel appliances, and an in-home washer and dryer.
Enjoy access to on-site amenities like tennis courts, volleyball courts, swimming pools, and a fitness facility.
With easy access to I-95, Route 128 and a Commuter Rail stop right on the premises, Boston commuters can walk out their front door and be whisked into South Station in just 25 minutes.
Located on Walpole Street / Route 1A in historic Norwood, The Commons at Windsor Gardens is just a short distance from many dining, nightlife, shopping, and recreational destinations.
Schedule a tour today and experience stylish apartment living in Norwood.
We are currently offering self-guided tours.
Features:

Air Conditioner, Dishwasher, Walk-In Closets, Stainless Steel Appliances, Parquet Wood Flooring, Ceramic Tile Flooring, Range, Microwave, Black Appliances, Grey Vinyl Tile Flooring, Faux Quartz Countertops, Patio, Shaker-style Cabinetry, Hardwood Flooring, Dryer, Washer and Dryer Connections, Balcony/Patio, Heat, Vaulted Ceilings, View, Washer, Refrigerator, Washer and Dryer In Home, White Appliances, Window Coverings, Disposal
*Apartment amenities not available in every home.
Community amenities may require an additional fee.
